name: Typical cop routine
description:
Live one Day as a cop in an exciting 2D platformer

Controls:

• Move - A (Left), D (Right)

• Attack - Left click (mouse)

• Jump - SPACEBAR

Development tools:

Engine - Unity

Visual - Aseprite, Adobe Photoshop

Project team:

Baidan Vladislav ( https://baidan123v.itch.io/ ) - Game Design

https://oleg20111511.itch.io/ - Code

DHunt - Visual Artist
